   21: %%
   22: -module(mnesia_examples_test).
   23: -author('hakan@erix.ericsson.se').
   24: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   25:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   26:          all/0, groups/0]).
   27: -export([bup/1, company/1, meter/1,
   28:          replica_test/1, sticky_replica_test/1, dist_test/1,
   29:          conflict_test/1, frag_test/1, frag2_test/1, remote_test/1,
   30:          remote_frag2_test/1, opt_load/1]).
   31: 
   32: -include("mnesia_test_lib.hrl").
   33: 
   34: init_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   35:     mnesia_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   36: 
   37: end_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   38:     mnesia_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   39: 
   40: -define(init(N, Config),
   41: 	mnesia_test_lib:prepare_test_case([{init_test_case, [mnesia]},
   42: 					   delete_schema],
   43: 					  N, Config, ?FILE, ?LINE)).
   44: 
   45: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   46: all() -> 
   47:     [bup, %% company,
   48:      meter, {group, tpcb}].
   49: 
   50: groups() -> 
   51:     [{tpcb, [],
   52:       [replica_test, sticky_replica_test, dist_test,
   53:        conflict_test, frag_test, frag2_test, remote_test,
   54:        remote_frag2_test]}].
   55: 
   56: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   57:     Config.
   58: 
   59: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   60:     Config.
   61: 
   62: 
   63: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   64: bup(doc) -> ["Run the backup examples in bup.erl"];
   65: bup(suite) -> [];
   66: bup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   67:     Nodes = ?init(3, Config),
   68:     opt_net_load(bup),
   69:     ?match(ok, bup:test(Nodes)).
   70: 
   71: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   72: company(doc) ->
   73:     ["Run the company examples in company.erl and company_o.erl"].
   74: 
   75: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   76: 
   77: replica_test(suite) -> [];
   78: replica_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   79:     ?init(3, Config),
   80:     opt_net_load(mnesia_tpcb),
   81:     ?match({ok, _}, mnesia_tpcb:start(config(replica_test, ram_copies))).
   82: 
   83: sticky_replica_test(suite) -> [];
   84: sticky_replica_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   85:     ?init(3, Config),
   86:     opt_net_load(mnesia_tpcb),
   87:     ?match({ok, _}, mnesia_tpcb:start(config(sticky_replica_test, ram_copies))).
   88: 
   89: dist_test(suite) -> [];
   90: dist_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   91:     ?init(3, [{tc_timeout, timer:minutes(10)} | Config]),
   92:     opt_net_load(mnesia_tpcb),
   93:     ?match({ok, _}, mnesia_tpcb:start(config(dist_test, ram_copies))).
   94: 
   95: conflict_test(suite) -> [];
   96: conflict_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   97:     ?init(3, Config),
   98:     opt_net_load(mnesia_tpcb),
   99:     ?match({ok, _}, mnesia_tpcb:start(config(conflict_test, ram_copies))).
  100: 
  101: frag_test(suite) -> [];
  102: frag_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  103:     ?init(3, Config),
  104:     opt_net_load(mnesia_tpcb),
  105:     ?match({ok, _}, mnesia_tpcb:start(config(frag_test, ram_copies))).
  106: 
  107: frag2_test(suite) -> [];
  108: frag2_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  109:     ?init(3, Config),
  110:     opt_net_load(mnesia_tpcb),
  111:     ?match({ok, _}, mnesia_tpcb:start(config(frag2_test, ram_copies))).
  112: 
  113: remote_test(suite) -> [];
  114: remote_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  115:     ?init(3, Config),
  116:     opt_net_load(mnesia_tpcb),
  117:     ?match({ok, _}, mnesia_tpcb:start(config(remote_test, ram_copies))).
  118: 
  119: remote_frag2_test(suite) -> [];
  120: remote_frag2_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  121:     ?init(3, Config),
  122:     opt_net_load(mnesia_tpcb),
  123:     ?match({ok, _}, mnesia_tpcb:start(config(remote_frag2_test, ram_copies))).
  124: 
  125: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  126: meter(doc) ->
  127:     ["Run the meter example in mnesia_meter.erl"];
  128: meter(suite) ->
  129:     [];
  130: meter(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  131:     [N | _] = ?init(3, Config),
  132:     opt_net_load(mnesia_meter),
  133:     ?match(ok, mnesia_meter:go(ram_copies, [N])).
  134: 
  135: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  136: 
  137: config(Test, Type) ->
  138:     Config0 = mnesia_tpcb:config(Test, Type),
  139:     %% Cut the times, the idea is to test the example and configuration
  140:     %% not running the test a long time
  141:     Config1 = lists:keyreplace(stop_after, 1, Config0, {stop_after, 6000}),
  142:     lists:keyreplace(report_interval, 1, Config1, {report_interval, 1000}).
  143: 
  144: opt_net_load(ExampleMod) ->
  145:     opt_net_load([node() | nodes()], ExampleMod, ok).
  146: 
  147: opt_net_load([Node | Nodes], ExampleMod, Res) ->
  148:     case rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, opt_load, [ExampleMod]) of
  149: 	{module, ExampleMod} ->
  150: 	    opt_net_load(Nodes, ExampleMod, Res);
  151: 	{error, Reason} ->
  152: 	    Error = {opt_net_load, ExampleMod, Node, Reason},
  153: 	    opt_net_load(Nodes, ExampleMod, {error, Error});
  154: 	{badrpc, Reason} ->
  155: 	    Error = {opt_net_load, ExampleMod, Node, Reason},
  156: 	    opt_net_load(Nodes, ExampleMod, {error, Error})
  157:     end;
  158: opt_net_load([], _ExampleMod, Res) ->
  159:     Res.
  160: 
  161: opt_load(Mod) ->
  162:     case code:is_loaded(Mod) of
  163: 	{file, _} ->
  164: 	    {module, Mod};
  165: 	false ->
  166: 	    Abs = filename:join([code:lib_dir(mnesia), examples, Mod]),
  167: 	    code:load_abs(Abs)
  168:     end.
